    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static QueueView create(Station.QueueType type,
                               java.lang.String text,
                               Station station,
                               int xfactor)
        Creates a new text view of the queue
        Parameters:
        type - the type of queue we have
        text - the text content of the view
        station - the station the queue belongs to
        xfactor - affects the x position of the view
        Returns:
        the QueueView
